author: cnbc.com
title: Monotype Schedules First Quarter 2018 Financial Results Release and Conference Call
text:
WOBURN, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Monotype Imaging Holdings Inc. (Nasdaq: TYPE) will announce its first quarter 2018 financial results before the U.S. financial markets open on Friday, April 27, 2018, and host a related conference call at 8:30 a.m. EDT that day. Scott Landers, president and chief executive officer, and Tony Callini, executive vice president and chief financial officer, will discuss Monotype’s first quarter results for the period ended March 31, 2018.
Individuals who are interested in listening to the audio webcast should log on to the “ Investors ” portion of the “Company” section of Monotype’s website at www.monotype.com . The live call can also be accessed by dialing 855-312-5713 (domestic) or 703-925-2611 (international) using passcode 5485309. If individuals are unable to listen to the live call, the audio webcast will be archived in the Investors portion of the company’s website for one year.
About Monotype
Monotype provides the design assets, technology and expertise that help create beautiful, authentic and impactful brands that customers will engage with and value, wherever they experience the brand, now and in the future. Further information is available at www.monotype.com . Follow Monotype on Twitter , Instagram and LinkedIn .
Monotype is a trademark of Monotype Imaging Inc. registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain jurisdictions. ©2018 Monotype Imaging Holdings Inc. All rights reserved.
